page.title: 03The homes we live in.
page.content: On my way to school I see old terraced houses and stone semi- detached and detached houses on the main roads. Many of the old stone houses have been improved. My home is in the middle of a council estate but like many of our neighbours my parents have recently bought it from the council. Some of my friends live on the estates of semi-detached houses which are quite new and privately owned. The only flats I see are owned by the council. Elderly people live in them. Most of the bungalows I see are on two private estates in our area. Some are detached and others are semi-detached. The council own a small number of bungalows and keep them for elderly or handicapped people.
